name: srp-allstaff
description: SRP全员插件 - 飞书集成工具（云文档、消息与群组）

srp:lark-docs.description: Access Lark documents and wiki (飞书云文档与知识库)

srp:lark-messages.description: Access Lark messages and groups (飞书消息与群组)

srp:docs.description: Quick alias for Lark documents (飞书云文档快捷命令)

srp:msg.description: Quick alias for Lark messages (飞书消息快捷命令)
